event.title: Autumn Glory Festival, a fall festival that attracts

data.event: The Autumn Glory Festival, a fall festival that attracts a great number of tourists, takes place in Oakland every October.

event.title: was formally incorporated as a town in 1862

data.event: Oakland was formally incorporated as a town in 1862.

event.title: was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1973

data.event: The town is home to a historic B&O railroad station, which was listed on the National Register of Historic Places in 1973, and restored in the 2000s.
